CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(Global_Pricing_Adjuster__c),HYPERLINK( 'http://solidify.force.com/solidify_proposal?id='+Id , 'Review Your Loan Information Here'),HYPERLINK( 'http://solidify.force.com/proposalRate/solidify_proposalRate?id='+Id , 'Review Your Loan Information Here'))
CustomField.label: Client Link
